A_LOT_OF_THIS_STUFF: ...is simply in the wrong lookup file!
NOTE_ABOUT_WIDTHS: Ideally the Editor schema would refer to this property, rather than hard-code it...
TICKS_PROPERTY: ...is here for now, but eventually moves (I think) into the Editor for the user to play with...
